lead_paragraph: George Zahringer III of Deepdale Golf Club won the 52nd Metropolitan Golf Association Ike Championship yesterday at Fenway Golf Club in Scarsdale by four strokes over Andreas Huber of Garden City Golf Club. Zahringer, 54, won his fifth Ike title and became the oldest champion in tournament history. He shot 75-71 yesterday for a 219 total.
